item.title: CVE-2023-5511|2024-08-02T07:59:44.924Z -- snipe -- snipe%2Fsnipe-it
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) in GitHub repository snipe/snipe-it prior to v.6.2.3.

item.title: CVE-2023-5452|2024-08-02T07:59:44.687Z -- snipe -- snipe%2Fsnipe-it
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) - Stored in GitHub repository snipe/snipe-it prior to v6.2.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-5685|2024-08-01T21:18:06.834Z -- snipe -- snipe-it
item.description: Users with "User:edit" and "Self:api" permissions can promote or demote themselves or other users by performing changes to the group's memberships via API call.This issue affects snipe-it: from v4.6.17 through v6.4.1.
